mapper.select: SELECT id as id, type as type, score as score FROM darts_result WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO darts_result(type, score, date, darts_user, numRounds) VALUES(#{type.value}, #{score}, #{timestamp}, #{username}, #{numRounds})
INSERT INTO turn(round, score, game_id) VALUES(#{roundResult.round}, #{roundResult.score}, #{foreignKey})

INSERT INTO three_dart_turn(firstDart, secondDart, thirdDart, round, game_id) VALUES(#{roundResult.firstDart}, #{roundResult.secondDart}, #{roundResult.thirdDart}, #{roundResult.round}, #{foreignKey})
INSERT INTO free_dart(target, dart, score, dart_time) VALUES(#{target}, #{dart}, #{score}, #{dateTimeManagement.timestamp})
mapper.update: UPDATE darts_result SET type = #{type}, score = #{score}, WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT target, sum(score) as aggregateScore, count(target) as numDarts from free_dart group by target;
SELECT * from free_dart where target = #{target} ORDER BY dart_time LIMIT 100;
